summary: This document details an interview conducted regarding a homicide investigation of a Columbus attorney killed in the mid-1980s. It discusses the involvement of various individuals in the case, including allegations of misconduct and fraudulent activities, as well as the circumstances surrounding the attorney's death. The document also clarifies that there is no evidence connecting Jeffrey Epstein to the homicide.

events.description: A city commission was formed to investigate allegations of misconduct by the city's police chief, leading to the involvement of additional detectives in the homicide case.
